queries.description: Privileged containers lack essential security restrictions and should be avoided by removing the 'privileged' flag or by changing its value to false
Containers should not have CAP_SYS_ADMIN Linux capability

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=nfs should not use CAP_SYS_ADMIN Linux capability
spec.template.spec.containers.name=nfs should not use CAP_SYS_ADMIN Linux capability

queries.query_name: Non Kube System Pod With Host Mount
queries.description: A non kube-system workload should not have hostPath mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'csi-nfs-controller' of kind 'Deployment' in non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/var/lib/kubelet/pods' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'csi-nfs-controller' of kind 'Deployment' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/var/lib/kubelet/pods' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'csi-nfs-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-nfsplugin' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'csi-nfs-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-nfsplugin' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'csi-nfs-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/var/lib/kubelet/pods' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'csi-nfs-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/var/lib/kubelet/pods' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'csi-nfs-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/var/lib/kubelet/plugins_registry' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'csi-nfs-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/var/lib/kubelet/plugins_registry' mounted

queries.description: Containers should not run with allowPrivilegeEscalation in order to prevent them from gaining more privileges than their parent process

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{csi-nfs-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{csi-provisioner}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{csi-nfs-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{liveness-probe}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{csi-nfs-node}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{liveness-probe}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{csi-nfs-node}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{node-driver-registrar}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{csi-nfs-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{csi-snapshotter}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false

queries.query_name: Volume Mount With OS Directory Write Permissions
queries.description: Containers can mount sensitive folders from the hosts, giving them potentially dangerous access to critical host configurations and binaries.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{csi-nfs-node}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{nfs}}.volumeMounts.name={{pods-mount-dir}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{csi-nfs-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{nfs}}.volumeMounts.name={{pods-mount-dir}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true

queries.query_name: Workload Mounting With Sensitive OS Directory
queries.description: Workload is mounting a volume with sensitive OS Directory

files.expected_value: Workload name 'csi-nfs-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-nfsplugin' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'csi-nfs-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-nfsplugin' with hostPath

files.expected_value: Workload name 'csi-nfs-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/var/lib/kubelet/pods' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'csi-nfs-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/var/lib/kubelet/pods' with hostPath

files.expected_value: Workload name 'csi-nfs-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/var/lib/kubelet/plugins_registry' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'csi-nfs-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/var/lib/kubelet/plugins_registry' with hostPath

files.expected_value: Workload name 'csi-nfs-controller' of kind 'Deployment' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/var/lib/kubelet/pods' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'csi-nfs-controller' of kind 'Deployment' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/var/lib/kubelet/pods' with hostPath

queries.description: Containers should only run as non-root user. This limits the exploitability of security misconfigurations and restricts an attacker's possibilities in case of compromise

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{csi-nfs-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{liveness-probe}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{csi-nfs-node}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{liveness-probe}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{csi-nfs-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{nfs}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{csi-nfs-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{csi-provisioner}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{csi-nfs-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{csi-snapshotter}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{csi-nfs-node}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{node-driver-registrar}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{csi-nfs-node}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{nfs}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.
Containers should not have extra capabilities allowed

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{csi-nfs-node}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{nfs}} has no capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{csi-nfs-node}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{nfs}} has a capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{csi-nfs-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{nfs}} has no capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{csi-nfs-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{nfs}} has a capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE

queries.description: Containers should drop 'ALL' or at least 'NET_RAW' capabilities

queries.query_name: RBAC Roles with Read Secrets Permissions
queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with get/watch/list RBAC permissions on Kubernetes secrets are dangerous and should be avoided. In case of compromise, attackers could abuse these roles to access sensitive data, such as passwords, tokens and keys

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{nfs-external-provisioner-role}}.rules[7] should not be granted read access to Secrets objects
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{nfs-external-provisioner-role}}.rules[7] is granted read access (verbs: get) to Secrets objects

queries.description: Check if Readiness Probe is not configured.

queries.query_name: Service Account Token Automount Not Disabled
queries.description: Service Account Tokens are automatically mounted even if not necessary

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{csi-nfs-controller}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
metadata.name={{csi-nfs-node}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false

queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles when binded, should not use get, list or watch as verbs

files.expected_value: The metadata.name={{nfs-external-provisioner-role}}.rules.verbs should not contain the following verbs: [["get"]]

queries.description: Container should not share the host network namespace

files.expected_value: 'spec.template.spec.hostNetwork' should be set to false or undefined
'spec.template.spec.hostNetwork' should be set to false or undefined

queries.description: Namespaces like 'default', 'kube-system' or 'kube-public' should not be used

'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public

queries.description: CPU limits should be set because if the system has CPU time free, a container is guaranteed to be allocated as much CPU as it requests

queries.query_name: Image Pull Policy Of The Container Is Not Set To Always
queries.description: Image Pull Policy of the container must be defined and set to Always

queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{csi-nfs-controller}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{nfs}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{csi-nfs-node}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{nfs}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{csi-nfs-node}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{nfs}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{csi-nfs-controller}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{liveness-probe}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{csi-nfs-controller}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{liveness-probe}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{csi-nfs-controller}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{csi-provisioner}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{csi-nfs-controller}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{csi-provisioner}}

queries.description: Sees if Kubernetes Drop Capabilities exists to ensure containers security context
Each namespace should have a LimitRange policy associated to ensure that resource allocations of Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims do not exceed the defined boundaries

metadata.name={{csi-nfs-controller}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

queries.description: Each namespace should have a ResourceQuota policy associated to limit the total amount of resources Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims can consume

metadata.name={{csi-nfs-node}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

queries.description: A security context defines privilege and access control settings for a Pod or Container
